attributes.action: Big Society, Big European Debate...or Bread and Butter Issues..?
attributes.additional_details:
Why doesn't the Government look at 'Bread and Butter' issues like filling in the dangerous potholes. These make Britain feel like a 3rd world country....sort these out instead of getting involved with 'The Big Society' whatever that means or 'The Big European Debate' which everyone knows will end up as a fudge and not affect them one jot.
Let's start with potholes - they're dangerous.
Get them sorted.
